title: My Little Pony: Tomodachi wa Mahou
alternative_title: MLP, My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, マイリトルポニー～トモダチは魔法～
description: The August issue of Shogakukan's Pucchigumi magazine revealed on Saturday that Akira Himekawa is drawing the previously announced manga based on Hasbro's My Little Pony ~Tomodachi wa Mahō~ (My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic) television series. The manga will debut in the next issue on August 12. The two manga creators who go by the name Akira Himekawa have been drawing various Legend of Zelda manga over the years.
